sn51.1:1.1: “Cattarome, bhikkhave, iddhipada bhavita bahulikata apara param gamanaya samvattanti.
sn51.1:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamadhippadhanasankharasamannagatam iddhipadam bhaveti,
sn51.1:1.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro iddhipada bhavita bahulikata apara param gamanaya samvattanti”ti.
